project_descr: The Nias Islands Transition Project: Enhanced Nias district capacity to successfully complete the recovery process

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA

outputs.output_descr: Disaster risk reduction integrated into future local government development activities including recovery and reconstruction

outputs.output_descr: In this phase, the project is effectively and efficiently managed, monitored, evaluated and audited. UNDP will provide management support to the Nias Island Transition Project to ensure its effective implementation.
donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
